messages.title: FOR A STRONG AND EXPERIENCED CONSTITUENCY MP
messages.content: Steve Brine has a track record as a strong and experienced Member of Parliament, being able to get things done locally.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The importance of every vote in the context of the Prime Minister and opposition leader potentially being in No. 10 and the work done locally by the candidate.

politicalExperience.achievements: Helped thousands of residents with casework, affected collective outcomes, promises a positive local campaign over the next few weeks.

contactInformation.address: Steve Brine's Campaign Centre, Manor Farm, Itchen Stoke, Alresford SO24 0QT

quotes.text: Steve has done the job for seven years and knows how to get results for his constituents.
Steve has built the key relationships that really matter so he can be effective on issues such as the local NHS, schools and the economy.
As one of Theresa May's Ministers, Steve is able to ensure our voice is heard at the heart of Government.

images.caption: Image of Steve Brine with two children in a natural setting.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet highlights Steve Brine's commitment to running a positive campaign as an experienced MP supporting Theresa May.
